title: Champions who 1 shot squishies better than assassins.
body:
{{champion:81}} as ap
{{champion:67}} Tumble shiv crit
{{champion:119}} Axe crit
{{champion:104}} Q+R
{{champion:37}} Full ap R Q AA
{{champion:53}} AP Q R
{{champion:54}}  Ap R Q E
oh and any mage ever
they just do it from range and with cc added on it.

Feel free to add more.
